item.title: Hitting
item.description: Motivation Hitting is complex with many schools of thought. As kids grow, I think it is imperative that we continue to re-evaluate which school of thought we teach kids that will in the long term benefit. My recent searches for hitting drills led me to a video that discusses two different hitting approaches. After watching this video, I became convinced that there was a better way to teach kids how to properly hit.

item.title: Fielding
Pitching
item.description: Motivation Learn how to throw with intent, strength, and accuracy Put together a good throwing program to help foster a culture of hard throwing Drills Wall Drill Duration: 10 minutes Objective: Work on using gravity and your back leg to start your stride Back pocket hits wall only Setup: Find a wall and set up about 6 inches away Focus on a target in front of you From the stretch, bring your knee up and start your movement Your back pocket should hit the wall only Callouts:
